description: At Italian Restaurant, enjoy classic Italian dishes made with fresh ingredients. The menu features traditional favorites like lasagna and steak.

menu.description: At Italian Restaurant, the main courses are the heart of the meal.

items.name: Lasagna
items.description: Traditional baked pasta with meat ragu, bechamel, and cheese
items.image_prompt: A delicious photo of lasagna, baked with meat ragu, bechamel, and cheese, served at Italian Restaurant.

items.name: Tagliata Di Manzo
items.description: Sliced grilled steak with arugula, cherry tomatoes, and parmesan
items.image_prompt: A close-up photo of tagliata di manzo, sliced grilled steak with arugula and parmesan, served at Italian Restaurant.

items.name: Risotto Ai Funghi
items.description: Creamy risotto with mixed wild mushrooms and parmesan
items.image_prompt: A creamy risotto ai funghi, with mixed wild mushrooms and parmesan, served at Italian Restaurant.
